info.title: Facebook Profile Pic Viewer
info.description:
View your friends fb profile picture even if they have blocked you or applied privacy to their profile Picture. This API is only for fun purpose :) Now also supports viewing your friends private albums. Enjoy fellas...
Note: Only for educational purpose

get.description: Get the short URL for fb profile pic

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: Enter the facebook username of the person whom you want to see the profile picture. Note : You must logged into your Facebook account in your browser.

parameters.name: userid
parameters.description: Enter the Facebook username of your friend. Note : You must logged into your Facebook account in your browser.
